"if you say so" Kenzo said transforming into a helochopter as he 
exited the base "Is there energon in the area?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Kup turned to face Nightlight. He was about to answer her when 
Rodimus walked in, followed by Kenzo.
> 
> Kup: Are sensors have determined that it is a crystalized object, 
but nothing more. We are going to go investigate it. Nightlight, 
Kenzo, you two are welcome to come with us.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Let's get going though, I want to know whats falling 
on our heads.
> 
> Prime and Kup walk out of the base. Once outside they transform to 
their respective alternate modes. The start to drive north into and 
hills. They drive slow waiting for Kenzo and Nightlight.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: catmastero 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:22 AM
>   Subject: Re: Artifact 1
> 
> 
>   Kenzo had seen the part coming (He was outside the base on guard 
>   duty) and saw it decending from the sky. He to walked to the 
control 
>   room and saw Kup and Rodimus "Just incase anyones interested a 
meteor 
>   like projectile landed north of your position, it was coming from 
the 
>   general direction of the predacon base" he said calmly "So should 
we 
>   investigate or just pretend it never happened?"
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
>   > Nightlight::
>   > 
>   > Nightlight was sleeping when the artifact 1 crashed, she woke 
up 
>   and 
>   > left her quarters; she walked towards the control room, she 
liked 
>   to 
>   > find out what was going there.
>   > 
>   > She came in to control room and said "What's going on ??? what 
was 
>   > that? " asked to Kup
>   >  
>   > 
>   > 
>   > 
>   > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
>   > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
>   > > 
>   > > Rodimus was looking over files in his computer when the room 
was 
>   > filled with a flash of light. The Commander turns around in his 
>   chair 
>   > to look out the large window. All he could see was the last of 
what 
>   > seemd to be a fire trail going down in the hills north of the 
base.
>   > > 
>   > > Rodimus Prime: What on Cybertron was that?!
>   > > 
>   > > Meanwhile in the control room Kup was still at the sensor 
station 
>   > when it picked up a signal. It was close and fast. The station 
>   > started a siren and started to flash alert lights.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup had been paying little attention to the screens and the 
>   alarms 
>   > and lights caused him to jump, nearly falling out of his chair. 
He 
>   > gets back up and tries to ID what the trouble was.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup: What in the bloody hell?! If this is the Predacons I'm 
going 
>   > to incenerate their hides!
>   > > 
>   > > Kup then figured out what had happaned, from the sensor data.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup was about to contact Rodimus when the Commander's voice 
came 
>   > over the comm system.
>   > > 
>   > > Rodimus Prime: Prime to control room, what's goind on? Did 
you 
>   pick 
>   > up that activity outside?
>   > > 
>   > > Kup hit a button so he could reply.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup: We picked it up alright, Sir. It scared the hell out of 
me! 
>   > The sensors read it as some sort of crystalized structure. Want 
me 
>   to 
>   > go check it out?
>   > > 
>   > > Rodimus Prime: Not alone, old timer, I'm coming also. I'll be 
>   right 
>   > there.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup: Old timer?! Why I oughta... Your getting pretty old 
yourself 
>   > Rody...
>   > > 
>   > > Kup was cut off as the comm link was closed.
>   > > 
>   > > Kup waited for Rodimus to arrive.
>   > > 
>   > > Rodimus stepped out of his office and started to walk to the 
>   > control room.
